title: Sara Ali Khan
summary: Sara Ali Khan (pronounced [saːɾa əˈli xaːn]; born 12 August 1995) is an Indian actress who works in Hindi-language films. Born into the Pataudi family, she is the daughter of actors Amrita Singh and Saif Ali Khan. She is the paternal granddaughter of Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi and Sharmila Tagore, and the maternal granddaughter of Shivinder Singh Virk and Rukhsana Sultana.
